data.name: Lum: Hide from Nightmares
data.detailed_description:
Lum is dead and now lost, finding its way to the other side. But it won't be as easy as it suppose to be. Escape from this world where negative and strong emotions birth terrible and corrupted creatures.

Lum won't be alone. Its best companion, an adorable dog, will guide you in this unknown place.
Hide from the fearsome creatures and escape from the dangerous traps.


  • Hide from the sight of the creatures
  • Control both Lum and Dog while you plan your escape
  • Distract enemies by barking
  • Solve small puzzles to progress in this world
  • Escape from dangerous traps and creatures
  • Collect items to help you find the way

data.short_description: Lum is a stealth and puzzle game where you control a soul and its companion dog. Hide and run from the nightmare creatures of this dreadful place while solving puzzles. Escape from the limbo to find peace in this short adventure!
